backend/main.mo: Backend actor handling provider initialization, user profiles, API key metadata, and access control with admin/user permission checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA manifest, icons, service worker registration, and root mount.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme, and metadata.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and navigation fallback for the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router configuring all provider and utility routes wrapped with AuthGate.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper requiring Internet Identity before rendering children, with loading and login screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth and clearing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and locally save their name.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatbotComm: Provides a chat interface for sending messages to a provider, handling drafts, backend readiness, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendCo: Shows detailed backend connection errors with recommended actions and retry or login options.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBoun: Catches rendering errors and displays a fallback UI with reset capability.
frontend/src/components/common/NotIntegr: Displays a notice indicating a feature is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/keys/ProviderKey: Manages viewing, adding, and updating stored provider API keys with backend connection handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders the site footer with branding and a terms link.
Wraps the main app layout with navigation, footer, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobilePro: Provides a mobile drawer listing AI providers with navigation links.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileTop: Implements a mobile top navigation menu linking to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, desktop links, mobile menu toggle, PWA install prompt, and login button.
frontend/src/components/providers/Provid: Checks backend connectivity and provider API key availability before rendering children, showing alerts or loading states as needed.
Displays a sidebar listing all AI providers with navigation links and highlights the active provider route.
Provides a dynamic form to configure and execute provider workflows, manage runs, and trigger image generation.
frontend/src/components/providers/Recomm: Shows a list of suggested prompts that users can click to insert into an input field.
frontend/src/components/pwa/PwaInstallPr: Displays install options for the PWA, including browser install prompts or iOS instructions when applicable.
frontend/src/components/workflows/Execut: Displays workflow run status, inputs, metadata, and an optional reuse action.
frontend/src/components/workflows/Genera: Shows past workflow runs with status, previews, and actions like download, share, or reuse.
UI component displaying workflow run status, actions (cancel, download, share), and input/output details.
Hook managing chat messages for a provider, including fetching and sending with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/keys/useProviderKey.t: Hooks for checking if a provider API key exists and saving or updating it through backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/providers/useCustomPr: Hooks to fetch and save custom provider metadata such as display names.
frontend/src/hooks/providers/useResolved: Resolves a provider's display name, using custom metadata when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Manages backend actor with retry logic and readiness state, using identity when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and exposes identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt logic, detecting install state and enabling manual prompting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks to load the caller's user profile and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/workflows/useCancelWo: Mutation hook to cancel a workflow run and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/workflows/useClearPen: Mutation hook to clear pending workflow runs for a provider and refresh queries.
frontend/src/hooks/workflows/useImageGen: Hook to generate images via backend workflows, updating run status and handling success or error states.
frontend/src/hooks/workflows/useWorkflow: Provides mutations to execute workflows and update workflow runs, with query invalidation and error handling.
Fetches workflow runs for a provider with polling for pending or running states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page showing admin-only tools, currently placeholder cards with access control.
frontend/src/pages/KeyVaultPage.tsx: Displays all providers and their API key status with links to manage each key.
frontend/src/pages/LinksDashboardPage.ts: Placeholder page for managing external links, showing non-integrated callout.
frontend/src/pages/MemoryBrainPage.tsx: Placeholder page describing future RAG and memory system features.
frontend/src/pages/ProviderHubPage.tsx: Lists AI providers with capabilities and links to their command centers.
frontend/src/pages/providers/CustomSlotP: Provides a customizable provider page allowing users to rename the provider, manage API keys, view prompts, and configure tool options.
frontend/src/pages/providers/GenericProv: Generic provider interface with tabs for chat and tools, integrated key management, recommended prompts, and workflow options.
frontend/src/pages/providers/LTXPage.tsx: A provider-specific page for LTX offering key management, recommended prompts, and workflow tool configuration.
OpenAI provider page with tabs for chat, image generation, and analysis, including custom tool sections and key management.
frontend/src/pages/providers/ReplicatePa: Replicate provider interface featuring key management, recommended prompts, and configurable workflow tool options.
RunPod provider page providing key management, recommended prompts, and workflow tool configuration.
frontend/src/pages/providers/SlackPage.t: Renders the Slack provider page with key management, prompt selection, and provider options. Manages a draft message and displays recommended prompts and tools.
frontend/src/pages/StudioToolsPage.tsx: Displays the Studio Tools dashboard with cards for Motion Brush, Magic Script, and Generation History, each marked as planned future features.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the Terms & Conditions page with sections covering usage rules, API key responsibility, privacy, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/providers/providers.ts: Defines provider configuration types and a list of provider metadata including IDs, routes, capabilities, options, and recommended prompts.
frontend/src/services/imageGeneration.ts: Implements image generation via OpenAI, Fal.ai, and Stability AI, handling API requests, prompt assembly, and returning image URLs and data.
frontend/src/utils/artifacts.ts: Provides utilities for artifact URLs, download handling (placeholder), MIME type detection, and filename generation.
Classifies backend errors into user-friendly messages with indicators for network, authentication, and canister issues.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Shares artifact URLs using the Web Share API with clipboard fallback. Includes a helper to detect share support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query strings and hash-based routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app’s provider‑centric architecture, capabilities, known issues, and existing feature definitions for continued development.
